programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Narcotics detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover and pose as smugglers to infiltrate a powerful drug cartel. However, the operation is threatened when Crockett becomes dangerously involved with the wife of the organisation's ringleader. Michael Mann's crime thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Colin Farrell, Jamie Foxx, Gong Li, Naomie Harris and Luis Tosar

programme.title: Extortion
programme.desc: When a Caribbean family vacation takes a disastrous turn, a father finds himself at the mercy of a ruthless fisherman, and races against the clock to save his wife and son. Drama, starring Eion Bailey, Bethany Joy Lenz and Barkhad Abdi

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster

programme.title: Burn Country
programme.desc: An aspiring Afghan journalist moves to small-town California and begins investigating the disappearance of a local. Mystery drama, starring James Franco, Melissa Leo, Dominic Rains and Rachel Brosnahan

programme.title: Drone
programme.desc: A drone pilot who's spent his career conducting covert operations from the comfort of his own home is finally forced to confront his actions. Thriller, starring Sean Bean, Patrick Sabongui and Mary McCormack

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: A tormented cop searches in vain for the man who killed his wife while also investigating a series of murders connected to an experimental drug that causes nightmarish hallucinations. However, he finds himself pursued by a vengeful woman who thinks he was involved in the death of her sister. Action thriller, based on the video game, starring Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis and Beau Bridges

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Smuggler Danny Archer ends up in prison in war-torn Sierra Leone in 1999, where he meets Solomon, a Mende fisherman separated from his family by guerrillas. Danny pledges to help the desperate man rescue his son, who has been forcibly conscripted as a child soldier, in return for a rare pink diamond that Solomon had hidden away before his capture. Action thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Djimon Hounsou and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Misanthropic Korean War veteran Walt leads an isolated existence, and has a tense relationship with his family and nothing but contempt for his neighbours. When a teenager attempts to steal his prized car, he ends up trying to reform the thief, making a connection with the boy's relatives and defending them from a street gang. Drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood. With Christopher Carley and Bee Vang

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the Da Vinci Code expert suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan

programme.title: The Hatton Garden Job
programme.desc: A ragtag group of career criminals plot an audacious, multi-million-pound raid on an underground facility in London. True-life crime drama, with Stephen Moyer, Larry Lamb and Matthew Goode

programme.title: The Last Castle
programme.desc: A distinguished lieutenant general suffers the indignity of a court martial and ends up behind bars in a high-security military jail, where the chief warden keeps order with an iron fist. Outraged by the guards' behaviour, the fallen hero sets out to expose the violations with the help of his fellow prisoners. Thriller, starring Robert Redford, James Gandolfini, Delroy Lindo, Mark Ruffalo and Clifton Collins Jr(n)

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: A high-school counsellor is accused of rape by a student whose advances he spurned - and unfortunately for him, one of her peers backs up her story. Thriller, starring Neve Campbell, Denise Richards, Matt Dillon, Kevin Bacon, Theresa Russell, Robert Wagner and Bill Murray(n)

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet(n)

programme.title: Hoffa
programme.desc: Biopic of the American union leader, who was a key figure in a labour organisation of truck drivers for three decades, a role that brought him into conflict with both the federal government and into dangerous alliances with organised crime - which may have led to his mysterious disappearance. Starring Jack Nicholson, Armand Assante, John C Reilly and Danny DeVito, who also directed(n)

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: An FBI agent risks everything on the trail of masked robbers hitting a series of Cincinnati banks. Crime thriller, starring Christopher Meloni, Bruce Willis and Dave Bautista(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: The CIA becomes suspicious of Russia's nuclear activities, and agent Jack Ryan is ordered to investigate. However, it is not long before the threat of terrorists detonating a nuclear bomb on American soil is on the cards, sparking a race against the clock to avert disaster. Thriller based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Ben Affleck, Morgan Freeman, James Cromwell, Liev Schreiber, Bridget Moynahan and Alan Bates(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper(n)

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con battles to protect his estranged daughter from the cronies of her cartel member ex. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Erin Moriarty and Diego Luna(n)

programme.title: The Accountant

programme.title: Southern Fury
programme.desc: When his brother falls foul of a ruthless mobster, a straight-laced man calls on his old friend and cop to help out. Crime thriller, starring Adrian Grenier, John Cusack and Nicolas Cage(n)

programme.title: Hacked
programme.desc: A student watches a video of a murder on the internet, but the police refuse to believe the events in the film are real. She sets out to prove someone really has been killed, only to find herself trapped in a deadly game and in danger of becoming the murderer's next target. Thriller, starring Melanie Papalia and David Schlachtenhaufen

programme.title: Darling
programme.desc: A woman takes a job housesitting a mansion that has a grisly history. Alone in the building, she begins to suffer a series of terrifying visions and is left unable to tell whether she is descending into madness or if there really is a supernatural force at work. Horror, starring Lauren Ashley Carter and Sean Young

programme.title: Project: ALF
programme.desc: A lovable alien is captured by the US army who plan to destroy him, prompting two officers to come to his aid. Spin-off from the sci-fi comedy TV series, with Miguel Ferrer, Ed Begley Jr and Martin Sheen

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: A mild-mannered doctor sets up practice in a small town, but a cloud gathers over his career due to a series of unexplained deaths. Before long, he has to convince the locals that a horde of venomous spiders is responsible and confront his intense fear of arachnids into the bargain. Comedy horror, starring Jeff Daniels, John Goodman, Julian Sands and Brian McNamara

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson

programme.title: The Girl with All the Gifts
programme.desc: A scientist and a teacher living in a dystopian future embark on a journey of survival with a young girl named Melanie. Horror thriller, starring Gemma Arterton, Paddy Considine, Glenn Close and Sennia Nanua

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: After being sentenced to death, murder suspect Callum Lynch enters a virtual world in the search for a device that contains genetic code for free will. Video game adaptation, starring Michael Fassbender, Marion Cotillard, Jeremy Irons and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A team of scientists on the International Space Station fight for survival when an intelligent alien life form is brought on board. The creature, nicknamed Calvin, proves it will do anthing to stay alive, and the crew risk everything to ensure it does not make its way to Earth. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds and Ariyon Bakare

programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi

programme.desc: A real-estate agent gets caught up in something sinister when she has to sell a house with a dark past and meets the troubled teen who used to live there. Horror, starring Ashley Rickards, Nick Eversman and Michael Massee

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A ragtag team of gifted villains, including Deadshot, Harley Quinn and Killer Croc, are strong-armed into doing good by a no-nonsense government agent. Fantasy adventure, starring Will Smith, Margot Robbie and Jared Leto

programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patient's fractured mind as a 24th character attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalan's thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley

programme.desc: The sinister criminal Jigsaw is preparing to mete out his deranged and sadistic form of justice on more hapless victims. Horror sequel, starring Tobin Bell, Donnie Wahlberg, Shawnee Smith and Franky G(n)

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
programme.desc: The tyrannical Ivan Ooze is accidentally released from his super-secure prison by dim-witted construction workers after 6,000 years in captivity. Vowing to conquer the Earth, he unleashes a reign of terror on Los Angeles - leaving the colour-coded champions fighting to save the world from his evil clutches. Sci-fi adventure, starring Paul Freeman, David Yost, Jason David Frank, Steve Cardenas, Karan Ashley and Johnny Yong Bosch(n)

programme.title: The Call Up
programme.desc: Several gamers each receive a mysterious invitation offering them the chance to test drive the latest technology. They visit a facility where they are given the opportunity to play a hi-tech virtual reality combat game - but soon realise the conflict they are involved in is no simulation. Sci-fi adventure, starring Max Deacon and Christopher Obi(n)

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his `mother', he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances O'Connor(n)

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: After an African American photographer and his white girlfriend visit her wealthy parents, he suspects there's more to the locals than meets the eye. Psychological thriller, starring Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford and Caleb Landry Jones(n)

programme.desc: In a galaxy far, far away, maverick scientist's daughter Jyn Erso and the Rebel Alliance attempt to steal plans for a battle station capable of destroying entire worlds - the Death Star. Star Wars prequel set before the events of A New Hope, starring Felicity Jones, Diego Luna and Ben Mendelsohn(n)

Fantasy adventure, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen(n)

programme.desc: Dumped by the best man via text, a former maid of honour decides to pitch up at her friend's wedding anyway. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Craig Robinson and Lisa Kudrow

programme.title: Kill the King
programme.desc: Two lovers escape from a psychiatric hospital and head for LA, where they plan to kill Elvis Presley. Crime drama, starring Emily Browning, Luke Grimes and Ron Livingston

programme.title: Super Furry Animals
programme.desc: Chaos erupts when a cowardly critter uses an untested scientific contraption and accidentally swaps bodies with a caterpillar. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Vinnie Penna, Peter Linz, Mike Pollock and Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Dimwitted Rhode Island limousine driver Lloyd Christmas and his equally vacuous friend Harry Dunne embark on a disaster-fraught cross-country trip to Aspen, where they hope to reunite a briefcase with its female owner. However, the pair are unaware the case contains a $1million ransom they would have been better leaving well alone. Farrelly brothers comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly, Teri Garr and Mike Starr

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: A child psychologist, disheartened after the suicide of a former patient, takes on the case of a terrified boy haunted by ghostly apparitions, and tries to help him discover what the spirits want from him. M Night Shyamalan's supernatural thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Haley Joel Osment, Toni Collette and Olivia Williams

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: Deadly ghost scavengers, led by Captain Salazar, escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea, including Captain Jack Sparrow. Swashbuckling sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Javier Bardem and Geoffrey Rush

programme.desc: Wizarding Brit Newt Scamander arrives in 1920s New York with a bagful of magical creatures that proceed to cause chaos. Harry Potter prequel, starring Eddie Redmayne, Katherine Waterston and Colin Farrell

programme.desc: An art gallery owner is tormented by the violent thriller penned by ex-husband. Tom Ford's psychological thriller, starring Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal and Michael Shannon

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A fishing boat crew plucks a man out of the sea with two bullet wounds in his back and a safe-deposit number sewn into his skin - but absolutely no memory of who he is or how he got there. In the search for his true identity, he is pursued by assassins - but his skill at evading them suggests his own past is far from straightforward. Thriller, starring Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen and Brian Cox

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: A struggling Hollywood producer comes up with a cunning plan to splice secretly filmed footage of a famous action star into his latest low-budget sci-fi movie to give it a veneer of quality. However, his efforts drive the bewildered actor into having paranoid delusions that aliens really have invaded the Earth. Comedy, starring Steve Martin, Eddie Murphy, Heather Graham, Robert Downey Jr and Terence Stamp

programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose

programme.desc: A trio of African-American women attempt to overcome prejudice as they work on the US space programme. Biopic, starring Taraji P Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monae and Kevin Costner

programme.desc: When a New York executive tips into depression, his scheming partners plan to use his letters to Love, Time and Death against him. Fantasy drama, with Will Smith, Edward Norton and Helen Mirren

programme.desc: A bail enforcement agent is assigned the task of tracking down his own ex-wife, a wily reporter chasing a story about a murder cover-up. Action comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Jennifer Aniston, Gio Perez, Joel Garland, Jason Kolotouros and Matt Malloy

programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: When a New York executive tips into depression, his scheming partners plan to use his letters to Love, Time and Death against him. Fantasy drama, with Will Smith, Edward Norton and Helen Mirren(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate risk-management consultant decides whether or not to destroy an artificially created humanoid. Sci-fi thriller, starring Kate Mara, Anya Taylor-Joy and Rose Leslie(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A foul-tempered Victorian miser who hates the festive season is visited on Christmas Eve by a series of ghosts. The spirits intend to make him mend his wicked ways by showing him visions of the past, the present and what the future will hold for him if he does not change for the better. Animated fantasy based on Charles Dickens' novel, featuring motion-captured performances by Jim Carrey and Gary Oldman(n)

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis(n)

programme.title: Date and Switch
programme.desc: Two guys make a pact to lose their virginity before their senior prom, but things take an unexpected turn when one of them comes out of the closet. Comedy, starring Nicholas Braun, Hunter Cope and Dakota Johnson(n)

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown(n)

programme.title: The Lego Batman Movie
programme.desc: The Caped Crusader swings into action to save Gotham City from the Joker. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Will Arnett, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, Ralph Fiennes and Zach Galifianakis(n)

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: The armoured avenger hunts for the mastermind behind an untraceable series of bombings, despite being cut off from his usual resources and traumatised by a recent brush with death. His search uncovers a secret conspiracy involving a drug that renders the user indestructible. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Gwyneth Paltrow and Don Cheadle(n)

programme.title: Within
programme.desc: A family moves to a peaceful suburban neighbourhood to start a new life, but the dark history of their seemingly perfect home soon emerges. Horror, starring Michael Vartan, Erin Moriarty and Nadine Velazquez(n)

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown(n)

programme.title: Why Him
programme.desc: A protective dad is far from thrilled when his daughter begins dating a foul-mouthed playboy millionaire. Comedy, starring Bryan Cranston, James Franco and Zoey Deutch(n)

programme.title: American Mary
programme.desc: A medical student is short of cash, and increasingly disenchanted with her profession and the surgeons she once idolised. Needing some extra cash to make ends meet, she begins performing dangerous procedures in the sinister world of illegal underground surgeries. Thriller, starring Katharine Isabelle and Antonio Cupo

programme.title: The Bling Ring
programme.desc: Five teenagers united by an obsession with celebrity steal from the houses of the rich and famous stars they idolise, using the internet to follow their targets' movements. When the police finally catch up with them, the arrest brings a taste of the fame they have craved. Fact-based drama, starring Emma Watson and Israel Broussard

programme.title: Little Man Tate
programme.desc: A devoted mother faces a dilemma thanks to her prodigiously talented son, who is a whiz at all things mathematical and musical - but struggles to fit in with his classmates. A psychologist intervenes, only to discover her involvement causes more problems than it solves. Drama, directed by and starring Jodie Foster, with Dianne Wiest, Adam Hann-Byrd and Harry Connick Jr

programme.title: Cutthroat Island
programme.desc: A tough female pirate enlists the help of an educated slave in finding the three parts of a map leading to buried treasure. However, one of the pieces is in the hands of her cruel uncle, and she also has to find the loot before her crew mutinies or the British Navy catches up with her. Swashbuckling adventure, starring Geena Davis, Matthew Modine, Frank Langella and Maury Chaykin

programme.title: Pride & Prejudice
programme.desc: Elizabeth Bennet is one of five sisters whose mother is determined to find them suitable husbands. The arrival of a wealthy gentleman and his friends at a nearby mansion leads to an introduction between Elizabeth and the aloof Mr Darcy, to whom she takes an instant dislike. However, an unexpected attraction eventually develops. Period drama based on Jane Austen's novel, starring Keira Knightley, Matthew Macfadyen and Judi Dench

programme.title: Snow White & the Huntsman Interview Special
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart, Charlize Theron and Chris Hemsworth discuss making the fantasy adventure

programme.title: Snow White & the Huntsman
programme.desc: An evil queen learns that her reign will last for ever if she kills a princess, so sends a renowned warrior to find and murder her. However, he comes to realise his mistress's evil ways, and instead trains his intended victim to fight so they can bring the tyrant's rule to an end. Fantasy adventure, with Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth and Charlize Theron

programme.title: Three Billboards Interview Special
programme.desc: Writer-director Martin McDonagh and star Sam Rockwell talk about making the dramatic comedy about revenge and redemption in small-town America

programme.title: Alien 3
programme.desc: Ripley is marooned alone on an all-male prison planet, only to face another of the lethal extraterrestrial creatures - which begins to prey on the inmates. While trying to help them survive, she discovers a terrifying connection between herself and the monster. David Fincher's sci-fi thriller sequel, with Sigourney Weaver and Charles Dance

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: A CIA agent is accused of being a sleeper assassin with a deadly purpose - to kill the Russian president during a diplomatic visit and start a third world war. She goes on the run, with her colleagues in hot pursuit - but each attempt to prove her innocence only raises more questions about her identity. Action thriller, starring Angelina Jolie, Liev Schreiber and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: Monsoon Wedding
programme.desc: A family struggle to ensure their daughter marries the partner they've chosen for her. As the ceremony approaches, her cold feet look set to spell disaster for all concerned. Comedy drama, starring Vasundhara Das, Naseeruddin Shah, Lillete Dubey and Shefali Shetty. In Punjabi, English, Hindi and Urdu

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.desc: Documentary. Three Deaf people explain how falling in love helped them discover Deaf culture, Deaf identity and BSL

programme.title: Oh! What a Lovely War
programme.desc: First World War musical, comprising a series of satirical sketches highlighting the futility of conflict from the perspective of the ordinary soldiers - many from the same family - and covering famous historical moments, including the Christmas truce. Richard Attenborough's directorial debut, starring Ralph Richardson, Laurence Olivier, John Mills and John Gielgud

programme.title: The Misfits
programme.desc: A divorcee forms a relationship with a group of latter-day cowboys struggling to eke out a living roping wild horses in the Nevada desert. John Huston's Western, starring Marilyn Monroe, Clark Gable, Montgomery Clift, Eli Wallach and Thelma Ritter

programme.title: Ice Cold in Alex
programme.desc: The crew and passengers of an ambulance become stranded in the Libyan desert and face a perilous journey back to civilisation. Leading the trek is an alcoholic army captain, who vows to remain sober until he has completed the task - but his resolve is threatened by a stranger they rescue who is secretly an enemy spy. Second World War drama, with John Mills, Sylvia Syms, Anthony Quayle and Harry Andrews

programme.title: Morning Glory
programme.desc: A TV producer fired from a news station takes over running an early morning TV show which is on the brink of cancellation. She tries to revive its flagging fortunes by hiring a foul-tempered veteran news reporter as the new host, only to find he and his co-presenter loathe each other. Comedy, with Rachel McAdams, Harrison Ford and Diane Keaton

programme.title: Alien Resurrection
programme.desc: Scientists create a clone of Ripley to get hold of the alien queen growing inside her body and breed a new race of the monsters. However, when the creatures escape and turn on their makers, the new Ripley must lead a smuggling crew caught up in the mayhem to safety. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Sigourney Weaver, Winona Ryder and Ron Perlman

programme.title: 12 Years a Slave
programme.desc: A free black man living in pre-Civil War New York is abducted and sold into slavery. He spends the next 12 years struggling to survive and maintain his dignity in the face of brutal treatment, while clinging to a desperate hope that he can return to his family. Oscar-winning historical drama based on Solomon Northup's autobiographical book, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, Michael Fassbender, Benedict Cumberbatch and Brad Pitt

programme.title: The Selfish Giant Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Clio Barnard and young actors Conner Chapman and Shaun Thomas discuss making the British drama in an interview recorded at the 2013 Cannes Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Selfish Giant
programme.desc: Two boys with troubled home lives struggle to fit in at school, but find a purpose in their lives when a scrap metal dealer takes them under his wing. However, he begins to favour one of the youngsters over the other, leading to tension between the pair and self-destructive behaviour from the neglected lad. Drama, starring Conner Chapman and Shaun Thomas(n)

programme.title: Thunder Over Arizona
programme.desc: An honest cowboy is mistaken for the notorious outlaw he killed in self-defence. Before he can clear up the misunderstanding, he is approached by a corrupt mayor who draws him into a conspiracy to wrest control of a silver mine from its rightful owners. Western, starring Skip Homeier, Kristine Miller, George Macready and Wallace Ford(n)

programme.title: Destry Rides Again
programme.desc: A mild-mannered sheriff is assigned to clean up a lawless town ruled over by a ruthless gangster - but finds his biggest problem is a sultry saloon singer determined to exact revenge on him for resisting her charms. Comedy Western, starring James Stewart, Marlene Dietrich, Charles Winninger, Mischa Auer and Brian Donlevy(n)

programme.title: Charade
programme.desc: A distraught widow learns her husband was murdered for his part in a $250,000 robbery. The haul has gone missing, and his former accomplices are soon on her tail in the hunt for the missing proceeds. Not knowing where to turn, she takes up the offer of help from a dashing stranger, but is uncertain whether she can trust him. Romantic thriller, with Audrey Hepburn, Cary Grant, Walter Matthau and James Coburn(n)

programme.title: Sink the Bismarck
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama, charting the mission to track down and eliminate the pride of the German fleet, a fearsome battleship devastating British vessels in the North Atlantic, orchestrated by a British naval officer recovering from his wife's death in an air raid. Starring Kenneth More, Dana Wynter, Laurence Naismith and Karel Stepanek(n)

programme.title: Tomorrow, When the War Began
programme.desc: Seven Australian teenagers return from a camping trip in the wilderness to find that while away, their country has been invaded by a hostile foreign power and their families sent to prison camps. They form a resistance group to fight a guerrilla campaign against the occupying forces. Action adventure, starring Caitlin Stasey, Rachel Hurd-Wood and Lincoln Lewis(n)

programme.title: Prometheus Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Ridley Scott and actors Charlize Theron, Michael Fassbender and Noomi Rapace discuss the making of the sci-fi thriller(n)

programme.title: Prometheus

However, the explorers on board discover the extraterrestrials may not be the benevolent creatures they imagined, while the company funding the expedition has its own agenda. Ridley Scott's sci-fi thriller and Alien prequel, starring Noomi Rapace, Michael Fassbender, Charlize Theron and Idris Elba(n)

programme.title: Black Swan
programme.desc: A repressed ballet dancer leads a sheltered life, devoted entirely to her art. She pursues the lead role in a production of Swan Lake, but the director convinces her she will only be capable of dancing the part if she embraces her darker impulses. programme.desc: A blind boy feels useless because of his disability until he receives help from his father, who organises a football match with a difference

programme.title: Highway to Heaven

programme.sub-title: All the Colours of the Heart.

programme.desc: Drama based on the bestselling novel by Barbara Taylor Bradford following the journey of a Yorkshire kitchen maid to being one of the richest women in the world. Starring Jenny Seagrove, Barry Bostwick and Deborah Kerr

programme.title: Providence

programme.title: An Unfinished Affair
programme.desc: An art professor embarks on an affair with one of his students, but later abandons her. Unfortunately, she does not take kindly to being rejected, and gets revenge by seducing his son. Drama, with Jennie Garth, Tim Matheson and Leigh Taylor-Young

programme.title: The Thorn Birds
programme.desc: A priest harbours a secret desire for a woman that proves to be stronger than his love for the Church. Romantic drama based on Colleen McCullough's novel, with Richard Chamberlain

programme.title: Of Two Minds
programme.desc: A woman and her husband take responsibility for looking after her schizophrenic younger sister after the death of their mother. programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Grimacing Governor

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin falls in love with a lumberjack with a mysterious past. Meanwhile, Ike and Jim Bob hunt for uranium on Walton's Mountain(n)

programme.desc: Emma's father dies while saving Edwin's life, so the maid vows to avenge his death. Drama, starring Deborah Kerr(n)

programme.desc: A blind boy feels useless because of his disability until he receives help from his father, who organises a football match with a difference

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Donna and Robbie make plans to disrupt Heather and Charlie's wedding and Syd helps an apparently destitute man, little suspecting he is a cunning con artist. Mike Farrell stars

programme.title: Providence

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan tries to help a boy deal with his father's death, but the youngster responds to the tragedy by retreating into a fantasy world

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: All the Colours of the Heart.

programme.title: Cloud Waltzing

programme.title: A Woman of Substance

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: Providence

programme.title: Barbara Taylor Bradford's Love in Another Town
programme.desc: Abandoned by her husband, Maggie reinvents her life and moves to a new community. Before long, she meets younger man Jake, who unbeknown to her has endured the same rejection. Romantic drama, starring Victoria Principal and Adrian Pasdar

programme.title: An Unfinished Affair
programme.desc: An art professor embarks on an affair with one of his students, but later abandons her. Unfortunately, she does not take kindly to being rejected, and gets revenge by seducing his son. Drama, with Jennie Garth, Tim Matheson and Leigh Taylor-Young

programme.title: The Thorn Birds
programme.desc: A priest harbours a secret desire for a woman that proves to be stronger than his love for the Church. Romantic drama based on Colleen McCullough's novel, with Richard Chamberlain

programme.title: Of Two Minds

programme.desc: The Hansen clan throw a surprise party for Jim's 60th birthday and try to talk him out of retiring while Syd is asked to perform ritual surgery so a man can convert to Judaism(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark try to convince an ageing rancher that he is not too old to work with horses. Richard Farnsworth (The Straight Story) guest stars(n)

programme.title: A Kind of Loving
programme.desc: A factory worker gets his girlfriend pregnant, forcing them to endure years of misery and dashed hopes as they marry and move in with her disapproving, nagging mother. John Schlesinger's drama, starring Alan Bates, June Ritchie and Thora Hird(n)

programme.title: A Woman of Substance
programme.desc: Emma's father dies while saving Edwin's life, so the maid vows to avenge his death. Drama, starring Deborah Kerr(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia embarks on a one-woman strike, prompting John to take her on a belated honeymoon after 19 years of marriage(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: As Hallowe'en approaches, a recovering Syd prescribes a dose that almost kills a girl, making her fear she may have returned to work too soon. To make matters worse, she also suspects her substitute, Dr Roberts, is conspiring to take over the clinic(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Made Husbands Jealous
programme.desc: Part one of two. Adaptation of Jilly Cooper's novel about Lysander Hawkley, a philanderer whose best friend edges him into a new line of work - patching up ailing marriages. Stephen Billington stars, with Kim Criswell and Hugh Bonneville(n)

She meets a mysterious stranger online, who encourages her to take control of her own sexuality through encounters with a variety of men. Fact-based drama based on Delaine Morris' autobiographical book, starring Ashley Jones and Alex Carter(n)

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh

programme.desc: This comedy special is Griffin's magnum opus about the world, relationships and humanity as a whole. He celebrates his 30-year anniversary in comedy by being on stage and pulling laughter from his fans during the live taping

programme.title: The Rendezvous
programme.desc: Rachel, a Jewish-American doctor and Jake, an Arab-American government bureaucrat, are trying to solve the mysterious death of Rachel's brother. Racing around the world, they find themselves hunted by a doomsday group. The group believes Rachel and Jake possess an ancient script discovered by Rachel's brother that could bring about the end of days. Caught in the middle of a plot to hasten the end of mankind, Rachel and Jake must solve a murder and save the world

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: America's most hardened and dangerous criminals are transported via Con Air, a customized armored aircraft equipped with armed guards, hand and leg shackles, and top secret destinations. No one has ever escaped from one of these flying fortresses. A group of violent and deadly cons seizes control of one of the planes, taking the guards hostage and setting a course out of the country. Poe, an inmate who has done his time and is being shipped home to be reunited with his family, proves to be a fly in their ointment

programme.title: The Hulk
programme.desc: Scientist Bruce Banner is transformed into a giant super-strong creature and has to fight the forces of evil while fighting the evil within himself. Eric Bana stars with Academy Award winner Jennifer Connelly. Directed by Ang Lee

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: In 24 short hours Monty (Edward Norton) goes to prison for seven years. Once a king of Manhattan, Monty is about to say good-bye to the life he knew. On his last day on the outside, Monty tries to reconnect with his father (Brian Cox) and gets together with his two old friends, Jacob (Philip Seymour Hoffman) and Slaughtery (Barry Pepper). There's also his girlfriend, Naturelle (Rosario Dawson), who may or may not have been the one who tipped off the cops

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first

programme.desc: Sports and comedy come together in this comedy special hosted by Rob Gronkowski himself and featuring the standup comedy of Juston McKinney, Finesse Mitchell, Jay Larson, John Caparulo and Lenny Clarke

programme.title: Madea's Family Reunion
programme.desc: Writer, director and star Tyler Perry returns to his signature role in this comedy-drama that finds family matriarch Madea juggling several romantic crises involving her nieces' relationships as well as the funeral of an older sister - all on the weekend that her entire clan is gathering for a reunion. Cicely Tyson, Blair Underwood, Lynn Whitfield and Maya Angelou costar

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: A lonely Chicago token collector (Sandra Bullock) pines for a handsome commuter (Peter Gallagher). When she saves his life after a mugging that leaves him comatose, she's mistaken for his fiancee. Playing along, she instead falls in love with her "fiancee's" brother (Bill Pullman), thus setting in motion a decidedly bizarre love triangle. Jack Warden, Peter Boyle, Glynis Johns, Michael Rispoli, Ally Walker and Monica Keena costar in this romantic comedy that made Bullock a star

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. The dilemma the couple now faces echoes far beyond the island, engulfing and irrevocably impacting their world

programme.title: Band Aid
programme.desc: Anna (Zoe Lister-Jones) and Ben (Adam Pally) are a couple who can't stop fighting. Advised by their therapist to try and work through their grief unconventionally, they are reminded of their shared love of music. In a last-ditch effort to save their marriage, they decide to turn all their fights into song, and with the help of their neighbor Dave (Fred Armisen), they start a band

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Elliot, his girlfriend Sasha, and their friend John move into an old house off campus for their last year in college. Almost immediately, Sasha begins to suspect there is something wrong with the home, and enlists her clairvoyant friend Kim to hold a séance. Prompted by a clue in the house, they attract the attention of The Bye Bye Man, an insidious supernatural figure who deceives and preys upon his victims before causing them to turn on those around them

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: Before Chuck Wepner (Liev Schreiber) goes fifteen rounds with Muhammed Ali, he's a liquor salesman and father with a modest prizefighting career. His life changes overnight when, in 1975, he is chosen to take on The Greatest in a highly publicized title match. It's the beginning of a wild ride through the exhilarating highs and humbling lows of sudden fame. Elisabeth Moss and Naomi Watts costar(n)

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar(n)

programme.title: Eric Clapton: Life in 12 Bars
programme.desc: This documentary contextualizes Eric Clapton’s role in contemporary music and cultural history. Told through his own words, it reflects on his traumatic childhood, his difficult struggle with drugs and alcohol, the loss of his son and how he always found his inner strength and healing in music. It features extensive interviews with Clapton himself, along with his family, friends, musical collaborators, contemporaries and heroes – including late music icons B.B. King, Jimi Hendrix and George Harrison. Directed by Oscar winner Lili Fini Zanuck(n)

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Five young people find themselves stranded in Moscow, fighting to survive in the wake of a devastating alien attack in this sci-fi action thriller directed by Chris Gorak. Starring Emile Hirsch and Oliva Thirlby(n)

programme.title: Alone in Berlin
programme.desc: Otto and Anna Quangel (Brendan Gleeson & Emma Thompson) are a working-class husband and wife doing their best to ride out the war in Berlin in 1940. When their son is killed fighting on the frontlines however, everything changes. They begin pouring their rage and grief into postcards emblazoned with anti-Nazi slogans, risking everything to get their messages of protest across the city. This seemingly small act of subversion rattles the regime, including a police inspector (Daniel Brühl) who will not rest until the culprits have been caught(n)

programme.title: Rolling Stones: Sweet Summer Sun - Hyde Park Live
programme.desc: The biggest live show of the year: The Rolling Stones return to Hyde Park, London almost 44 years to the day after their legendary free concert in July 1969. Featuring their greatest hits across a career spanning 50 years, plus a special appearance by former Stones guitarist Mick Taylor. Highlights include 'Gimme Shelter,' 'Jumpin' Jack Flash,' 'You Can't Always Get What You Want' and '(I Can't Get No) Satisfaction.'(n)

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: In the early 1980s, Charlie Wilson is a womanizing US congressional representative from Texas who is a member of two major foreign policy and covert-ops committees. After being prodded by his major conservative supporter, Houston Socialite Joanne Herring, Wilson learns about the plight the people are suffering in the brutal Soviet occupation of Afghanistan. With the help of maverick CIA agent Gustav Avrakotos, Wilson dedicates his canny political efforts to supply the Afghan mujahideen with the weapons and support to defeat the Soviet Union(n)

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance(n)

programme.title: Alone in Berlin
programme.desc: Otto and Anna Quangel (Brendan Gleeson & Emma Thompson) are a working-class husband and wife doing their best to ride out the war in Berlin in 1940. When their son is killed fighting on the frontlines however, everything changes. They begin pouring their rage and grief into postcards emblazoned with anti-Nazi slogans, risking everything to get their messages of protest across the city. This seemingly small act of subversion rattles the regime, including a police inspector (Daniel Brühl) who will not rest until the culprits have been caught(n)

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Danny Madigan (Austin O'Brien) is a lonely 11-year-old boy who escapes from his bleak reality by glorying in the action adventure movies of his favorite film character, Jack Slater (Arnold Schwarzenegger). When his best friend, Nick the projectionist, gives him a special ticket to the new Slater film, Danny is magically transported into Jack's world, where the good guys always win. Danny becomes his helper as Jack battles a trio of nefarious bad guys, Benedict (Charles Dance), Vivaldi (Anthony Quinn) and The Ripper (Tom Noonan)

programme.title: The Hulk
programme.desc: Scientist Bruce Banner is transformed into a giant super-strong creature and has to fight the forces of evil while fighting the evil within himself. Eric Bana stars with Academy Award winner Jennifer Connelly. Directed by Ang Lee

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: In the world's first action-adventure film shot entirely from a first person perspective, a resurrected cyborg named Henry must fight through the streets of Moscow in pursuit of his kidnapped wife

programme.title: Reeker
programme.desc: A group of disparate strangers including a blind genius and a druggie who ripped off his ecstasy dealer converges on a small, abandoned town where they are promptly slaughtered one at a time by a grotesque and extremely foul-smelling creature. Devon Gummersall, Derek Richardson and Tina Illman star in this tongue-in-cheek horror flick

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: From Darren Lynn Bousman, the director of SAW II, III and IV, MOTHER'S DAY is a graphic remake of the horror classic. After a bank robbery gone wrong, three brothers go home to hide out, only to discover that their mother (Rebecca De Mornay) lost their house in a foreclosure. The new owners become the depraved brothers' unwitting hostages. Their sadistic mother soon arrives and brilliantly takes control of the situation, ratcheting up the terror

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: It's Vikings versus a dragon-like alien beast after an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes in an 8th-century Norwegian lake. James Caviezel, Sophia Myles and John Hurt star in this imaginative science fiction action thriller

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up

programme.title: Southland Tales
programme.desc: On July 4, 2008, Los Angeles stands on the brink of social, economic and environmental disaster. Boxer Santaros is an action star stricken with amnesia. His life intertwines with Krysta Now, an adult film star developing her own reality television project, and David Clark, a Hermosa Beach police officer who holds the key to a vast conspiracy

programme.title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
programme.desc: Rannulph Junuh (Matt Damon) is a gifted golfer from Savannah, GA, until traumatic experiences during World War I shatter his confidence. In 1931, Adele Invergordon (Charlize Theron), a beautiful heiress, inherits a spectacular golf course. To attract customers, she proposes a high-stakes competition that includes Junuh. It becomes obvious that he's not as good as he once was, and all seems lost until a mysterious gentleman named Bagger Vance (Will Smith) volunteers to serve as Junuh's caddy and coach. Robert Redford directs

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as the vampire Maximillian, the most undead dude in the 'hood. He also plays a paunchy preacher and a fast talking thug. Angela Basset plays the cop whose world is rocked by Maximillian's attempts to make her his mate for eternity. Kadeem Hardison plays the haplessly decaying vampire's sidekick who is forever losing things. Directed by Wes Craven

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: Loosely inspired by a shocking true story, this chilling psychological horror story follows a bickering couple on vacation in the Caribbean who are accidentally abandoned during a diving expedition and forced to fend for themselves in the ocean as they are surrounded by sharks - while the tour operators back at the harbor take 24 hours to realize that they have left a pair of customers stranded. Blanchard Ryan and Daniel Travis star in this gripping independent hit from writer/director Chris Kentis

programme.title: Sex Devil
programme.desc: One hazy night at a Halloween party, Raven (Joanna Angel) gets knocked up by Lucifer AKA the devil (Xander Corvus). 21 years later she tells her daughter Cindy (Leigh Raven) the truth about her father. After the two of them reunite at a local demonic ritual, Cindy is presented with the choice: remain on earth with her mother or train to be the next ruler of Hell! Cindy's voyage through the underworld is filled with whips, chains and debaucherous sex

programme.title: Survival Island
programme.desc: A shipwreck at sea leaves a wealthy married couple (Billy Zane and Kelly Brook) alive with only each other and a former servant (Juan Pablo di Pace) for companionship - a situation that quickly leads to sexual jealousy and murderous intentions

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse

programme.title: The Mist
programme.desc: A horrifying short story by Stephen King becomes this engrossing chiller about the survivors of a strange, mutating mist that invades a small town and brings with it unspeakable monsters. Thomas Jane, Laurie Holden, Andre Braugher, Marcia Gay Harden and William Sadler star in this film directed by Frank Darabont ("The Shawshank Redemption")

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Shaun (Simon Pegg) and his friends are in for a literal night from hell when they meet up at the local pub only to find themselves fighting off hordes of brain-hungry undead. Penelope Wilton, Kate Ashfield, Lucy Davis and Bill Nighy co-star in this zombie-fraught romantic comedy

programme.title: Encino Man
programme.desc: Two high school buddies dig up a frozen caveman in their backyard. Once the living fossil thaws out, the friends realize he's their ticket to being cool. Starring Pauly Shore, Sean Astin and Brendan Fraser

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth

programme.title: Cold Souls
programme.desc: Paul Giamatti stars in this surreal comedy as an actor paralyzed by anxiety who decides to have his soul extracted by a high-tech company in order to alleviate his suffering but complications ensue when a mysterious soul-trafficking mule steals his soul and takes it to Russia

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Shaun (Simon Pegg) and his friends are in for a literal night from hell when they meet up at the local pub only to find themselves fighting off hordes of brain-hungry undead. Penelope Wilton, Kate Ashfield, Lucy Davis and Bill Nighy co-star in this zombie-fraught romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: Encino Man
programme.desc: Two high school buddies dig up a frozen caveman in their backyard. Once the living fossil thaws out, the friends realize he's their ticket to being cool. Starring Pauly Shore, Sean Astin and Brendan Fraser(n)

programme.title: Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: An engaged couple goes away with their friends to a remote cabin to celebrate their upcoming wedding but the weekend takes a horrifying turn when dark secrets and forbidden desires are revealed and what started as a celebration quickly descends into a bloody nightmare(n)

programme.title: Battle Royale
programme.desc: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students, and places them on a on a desert island where they are forced to fight each other to death or all of them will be killed(n)

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims(n)

programme.title: Encino Man
programme.desc: Two high school buddies dig up a frozen caveman in their backyard. Once the living fossil thaws out, the friends realize he's their ticket to being cool. Starring Pauly Shore, Sean Astin and Brendan Fraser(n)

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress(n)

programme.title: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
programme.desc: Doctor Parnassus (Christopher Plummer) is cursed with a dark secret. Thousands of years ago he made a bet with the devil, Mr. Nick (Tom Waits), in which he won immortality. Centuries later, on meeting his one true love, Dr. Parnassus made another deal with the devil, trading his immortality for youth, on condition that when his daughter reaches her 16th birthday, she will become the property of Mr. Nick. His daughter is now rapidly approaching the age milestone and Dr. Parnassus is desperate to protect her from her impending fate(n)

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: James Remar and Sherilyn Fenn star in this horror flick about a morally ambiguous corporation that experiments with genetic modification, resulting in the creation of a man-hunting creature who escapes and terrorizes an unsuspecting community of cabin dwellers in a horrifying game of cat and mouse(n)

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat(n)

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress(n)

programme.title: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
programme.desc: Doctor Parnassus (Christopher Plummer) is cursed with a dark secret. Thousands of years ago he made a bet with the devil, Mr. Nick (Tom Waits), in which he won immortality. Centuries later, on meeting his one true love, Dr. Parnassus made another deal with the devil, trading his immortality for youth, on condition that when his daughter reaches her 16th birthday, she will become the property of Mr. Nick. His daughter is now rapidly approaching the age milestone and Dr. Parnassus is desperate to protect her from her impending fate(n)

programme.title: Reeker
programme.desc: A group of disparate strangers including a blind genius and a druggie who ripped off his ecstasy dealer converges on a small, abandoned town where they are promptly slaughtered one at a time by a grotesque and extremely foul-smelling creature. Devon Gummersall, Derek Richardson and Tina Illman star in this tongue-in-cheek horror flick(n)

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: From Darren Lynn Bousman, the director of SAW II, III and IV, MOTHER'S DAY is a graphic remake of the horror classic. After a bank robbery gone wrong, three brothers go home to hide out, only to discover that their mother (Rebecca De Mornay) lost their house in a foreclosure. The new owners become the depraved brothers' unwitting hostages. Their sadistic mother soon arrives and brilliantly takes control of the situation, ratcheting up the terror(n)

programme.title: Velvet Goldmine
programme.desc: Glam rock star Brian Slade predicts and enacts his own death onstage. When the killing is exposed as a hoax, Slade's stardom quickly ends. A decade later, journalist Arthur Stuart tries to track Slade down. He learns about Slade's life through his early years and initial encounters with American singer Curt Wild and ex-wife Mandy Slade, all the way to his ascent to fame as an innovative, bisexual rock star pushing the limits

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Criminals Willie (Tony Cox) and Marcus (Billy Bob Thornton) disguise themselves as Santa Claus and his elf and travel across the country to major malls, using the good will people have toward Santa to rob the stores blind. However, Willie can't stand kids and it's all he can do to keep himself from getting fired while on the job. Their plan progresses beautifully until the two meet an introverted 8-year-old boy who thinks Willie is the real Santa Claus, and strikes real sympathy in him

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as Professor Sherman Klump, a hugely obese scientist who falls for the lovely Professor Carla Purty (Jada Pinkett Smith). Desperate for her affections, Klump invents a DNA-altering drug that temporarily transforms him into the slender, testosterone-overloaded jerk, Buddy Love. Soon, both egos are competing for dominance and Carla's attention. Dave Chappelle and James Coburn co-star. Murphy also plays the entire Klump family

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Having done his best to keep Buddy buried in his subconscious, the portly Professor Sherman Klump (Eddie Murphy) is horrified to find him resurfacing in untimely outbursts, and threatening his marriage plans to colleague Denise Gains (Janet Jackson). Sherman decides to rid himself of his lecherous alter-ego once and for all, but Buddy emerges into his world and lays claim to the professor's youth serum. Buddy heads to Sherman's family home for the drug, but he'll have to deal with the entire Klump family first

programme.title: Nemr: No Bombing in Beirut
programme.desc: In this special filmed in both Lebanon and America, Nemr puts together an hour of uproarious comedy capturing thousands of people from the Middle East and America laughing at the same jokes, told by the same man. From his childhood in America, to his later years in Lebanon, Nemr recounts his life and touches on childhood, family, relationships, religion, war and the power of perspective

programme.title: The 4th
programme.desc: Jamie is a down-on-his-luck illustrator who's behind on rent and tries to throw a cookout while his overbearing roommate is out of town on the 4th of July. He decides to borrow his roommate's bike for a quick trip to buy lighter fluid, but his entire day and life quickly go up in smoke. After an incident with a road-rager, Jamie finds himself far from home and trapped in a series of awkward and infuriating situations with strangers

programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest. Of All Time.
programme.desc: In the early 1980s, after his recent and high profile defeat to Larry Holmes, boxing legend Muhammad Ali takes it upon himself to talk a suicidal stranger down from a ledge. Using his unique brand of wit and wisdom, he succeeds in persuading the man that life is worth living, and learns a huge amount about himself in the process. Starring Noel Clarke as Muhammad Ali, Osy Ikhile as Joe, Lucian Msamati as Herbert Muhammad and Danny John-Jules as Don King

programme.title: #ThatsHarassment
programme.desc: This film is a series of six short films, written and directed by Sigal Avin. It depicts six different cases of sexual harassment in the work place, all based on real events. In ‘The Boss,’ a young employee gets a ride home. In ‘The Photographer,’ a young model is put in an uncomfortable position. In ‘The Doctor,’ a patient is taken advantage of. In ‘The Actor,’ a costume dresser is taken aback. In ‘The Politician,’ a journalist is asked to take a break from an interview. In ‘The Co-worker,’ a bartender trains the new girl

programme.title: Burke & Hare
programme.desc: A pair of financially strapped, 19th century Irishmen (Simon Pegg and Andy Serkis) discover a lucrative if gruesome source of income when they begin providing corpses for medical experiments to a well-regarded Edinburgh doctor. Their newly filled coffers and the expensive attentions of their romantic interests, however, soon pressure them to continue and even enhance the cadaver procurement process. Isla Fisher costars in this dark period comedy

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Teenage buddies Cisco (Jorge Lendeborg Jr.), Junior (Moises Arias), Boobie (Ezri Walker), and Patty Cake (Rafi Gavron) shrug off school to practice skateboarding, which they hope will be their ticket to a better life. But when they get mixed up in a drug deal and cross a ruthless crime queen-pin (Linda Emond), they put their friendship—and lives—on the line. Set to a hip-hop soundtrack and featuring an ensemble cast that includes Michael K. Williams, Erykah Badu and rapper Machine Gun Kelly

programme.title: Last Weekend
programme.desc: Celia (Patricia Clarkson) is an aging matriarch who wants everyone to gather one last time at her family's gorgeous Lake Tahoe manor and reminisce before she puts it on the market. However, her sons are too preoccupied with their own busy lives and struggling relationships for any nostalgia. The dream of a splendid Labor Day weekend dies quickly in a whirlwind of contention, crisis and family dysfunction. Celia is forced to let go of her fantasy and attend to the harsh reality brought on by a sudden emergency

programme.title: The Eyes
programme.desc: When six strangers with unspeakable pasts wake up imprisoned in an abandoned warehouse, they discover they are being forced to participate in an evil experiment. Five of them must die, only one can live and they have two hours to decide amongst themselves who survives. The clock is ticking and if they don't decide, they will all die

programme.title: Black Sabbath - The End of The End
programme.desc: Chronicles the final tour from Black Sabbath. On February 4th, 2017, Black Sabbath takes the stage in Birmingham, the city where it all began, to play the 81st and final gig of the tour and bring down the curtain on a career that spanned almost half a century. The cameras are taken into the heart of the action, getting up close and personal with the band as they perform genre-defining hits, from 'Iron Man' to 'Paranoid' to 'War Pigs', among others. The special also features a studio performance of some of their songs not played on the tour

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: At the Boston airport, Clay (John Cusack) witnesses a scene of chaotic mayhem when an electronic signal turns hundreds of cell phone users into rabid killers. Desperate to find his estranged wife and son, Clay teams with a train driver (Samuel L. Jackson) to battle the horde of murderous phoners as the city descends into madness

programme.title: Brimstone
programme.desc: Liz (Dakota Fanning) is full of heart and grit but is being hunted by a vengeful Preacher (Guy Pearce) who is a diabolical zealot. She's a genuine survivor and uses her strength to claim the better life she and her daughter deserve

programme.title: Perrier's Bounty
programme.desc: A Dublin ne'er-do-well (Cillian Murphy) tries to dodge his debt payment to a local crime lord (Brendan Gleeson) and ends up in deeper trouble than ever in this crime comedy costarring Jim Broadbent

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: As a way to pay off their mounting debts, lifelong pals Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) decide to write, direct and star in a pornographic movie, which they believe to be a sure moneymaker. But they may end up as the first couple in adult cinematic history that discovers long-hidden feelings for each other while doing so. Craig Robinson costars in this romantic sex comedy

programme.title: 3 Strikes
programme.desc: After being paroled, young ex-con Rob Douglas (Brian Hooks) will do anything to avoid a third and final brush with the law, but trouble's got a way of tracking him down. Faizon Love, E-40, David Alan Grier and N'Bushe Wright costar in this raunchy comedy from the creator of "Friday."

programme.title: Burke & Hare
programme.desc: A pair of financially strapped, 19th century Irishmen (Simon Pegg and Andy Serkis) discover a lucrative if gruesome source of income when they begin providing corpses for medical experiments to a well-regarded Edinburgh doctor. Their newly filled coffers and the expensive attentions of their romantic interests, however, soon pressure them to continue and even enhance the cadaver procurement process. Isla Fisher costars in this dark period comedy

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out")

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Two brothers (Chris Pine and Ben Foster) come together to rob a bank that is foreclosing on their family land. Vengeance seems to be theirs until they find themselves in the crosshairs of a foul-mouthed Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) looking for one last triumph on the eve of his retirement. As the brothers plot one final heist, a showdown looms at the crossroads where the last honest law man and a pair of brothers with nothing to live for except family collide

programme.title: Dolan's Cadillac
programme.desc: Robinson (Wes Bentley) is a law-abiding schoolteacher until his wife Elizabeth unexpectedly witnesses a murder. The killer is Jimmy Dolan (Christian Slater), Las Vegas' most ruthless and untouchable mob boss. Elizabeth agrees to testify, and faces deadly consequences. Devastated by her death, Robinson tries everything to bring Dolan to justice. Without hard evidence however, Dolan remains free. Haunted by the ghost of wife, Robinson transforms himself into a vengeance-obsessed machine, pushing himself beyond the breaking point

programme.title: Operation Condor
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and his bumbling sidekick are sent on a quest through Europe to find a mysterious treasure held by a shadowy organization of monks

programme.title: Sniper
programme.desc: Legendary Marine sniper Tom Beckett (Tom Berenger) has an impressive 74 confirmed kills, and is sent to the hostile jungles of Central America to eliminate a dangerous rebel leader and his Colombian drug lord financier. As his spotter, the Pentagon chooses Richard Miller (Billy Zane), a silver-medal marksman aiming for a Washington promotion. Inexperienced and out of his element, Miller is unprepared for anything he'll encounter in the jungle

programme.title: Sniper 2
programme.desc: Sergeant Thomas Beckett is teamed up with a death row inmate named B.J. Cole on a suicide mission to the Balkans. Their target is a rogue general accused of running a stealth operation of hit-and-run ethnic cleansing missions in an area known as No Man's Land. However, Beckett discovers that the government is using him as a pawn in a bigger mission, and decides to do something about it. Tom Berenger and Bokeem Woodbine star

programme.title: Bad Ass
programme.desc: A shunned Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime(n)

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Two brothers (Chris Pine and Ben Foster) come together to rob a bank that is foreclosing on their family land. Vengeance seems to be theirs until they find themselves in the crosshairs of a foul-mouthed Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) looking for one last triumph on the eve of his retirement. As the brothers plot one final heist, a showdown looms at the crossroads where the last honest law man and a pair of brothers with nothing to live for except family collide(n)

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent(n)

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: From Darren Lynn Bousman, the director of SAW II, III and IV, MOTHER'S DAY is a graphic remake of the horror classic. After a bank robbery gone wrong, three brothers go home to hide out, only to discover that their mother (Rebecca De Mornay) lost their house in a foreclosure. The new owners become the depraved brothers' unwitting hostages. Their sadistic mother soon arrives and brilliantly takes control of the situation, ratcheting up the terror(n)

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others(n)

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope(n)

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino.
